name: Stage
description: The AWS::ApiGateway::Stage resource creates a stage for an Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) deployment.

properties.name: CacheClusterEnabled
properties.description: Indicates whether cache clustering is enabled for the stage.

properties.name: ClientCertificateId
properties.description: The identifier of the client certificate that API Gateway uses to call your integration endpoints in the stage.

properties.name: DeploymentId
properties.description: The ID of the deployment that the stage points to.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description of the stage's purpose.

properties.name: MethodSettings
properties.description: Settings for all methods in the stage.

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.description: The ID of the RestApi resource that you're deploying with this stage.

properties.name: StageName
properties.description: The name of the stage, which API Gateway uses as the first path segment in the invoke Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

properties.name: Variables
properties.description: A map (string to string map) that defines the stage variables, where the variable name is the key and the variable value is the value. Variable names are limited to alphanumeric characters. Values must match the following regular expression: [A-Za-z0-9-._~:/?#&=,]+.
